description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity for a Tic Tac Toe Android app. It manages the game state, user interactions, and UI updates for the game, including starting, restarting, handling cell clicks, checking for winners/draws, and updating the game board and status messages.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: MainActivity is the primary activity handling the logic and UI for the Tic Tac Toe game.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, binds views, and sets up event listeners.

methods.name: startGame
methods.description: Begins a new game, enables user interaction.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles user clicks on game board cells, updates game state, checks for win/draw.

methods.name: resetBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board to start a new game, optionally in a 'hard' reset mode.

methods.name: updateBoardUI
methods.description: Updates the display of all cells based on current game state.

methods.name: setBoardEnabled
methods.description: Enables or disables user interaction with the game board.

methods.name: updateStatusText
methods.description: Updates the status message indicating whose turn it is or game state.

methods.name: playerLabel
methods.description: Returns a user-friendly label for a player ('X' or 'O').

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Determines if there is a winner, returning 'X' or 'O' if found.

methods.name: isDraw
methods.description: Checks if the game ended in a draw.

methods.name: endGame
methods.description: Ends the game and disables further moves.
